sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import './About.css'; const About = () => { const [isVisible, setIsVisible] = useState(false); const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('story'); const sectionRef = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { const observer = new IntersectionObserver( ([entry]) => { if (entry.isIntersecting) { setIsVisible(true); } }, { threshold: 0.2 } ); if (sectionRef.current) { observer.observe(sectionRef.current); } return () => observer.disconnect(); }, []); const timelineData = [ { year: '1999', title: 'Foundation', description: 'Established as Kerala\'s premier fashion design institute with a vision to revolutionize fashion education.', icon: 'fas fa-flag' }, { year: '2005', title: 'AICTE Recognition', description: 'Received official recognition from All India Council for Technical Education, marking our commitment to quality.', icon: 'fas fa-certificate' }, { year: '2010', title: 'Industry Partnerships', description: 'Forged strategic partnerships with leading fashion houses and textile manufacturers globally.', icon: 'fas fa-handshake' }, { year: '2015', title: 'International Programs', description: 'Launched international exchange programs and collaborations with European fashion schools.', icon: 'fas fa-globe' }, { year: '2020', title: 'Digital Innovation', description: 'Pioneered digital fashion education with virtual reality studios and AI-powered design tools.', icon: 'fas fa-laptop' }, { year: '2024', title: 'Sustainability Focus', description: 'Leading the way in sustainable fashion education with eco-friendly practices and green technology.', icon: 'fas fa-leaf' } ]; const tabContent = { story: { title: 'Our Story', content: `Oxford Fashion Institute was born from a simple yet powerful vision: to transform creative minds into industry leaders. Founded in 1999, we've been at the forefront of fashion education in Kerala, nurturing over 5,000 students who now work with top brands globally. Our journey began with just 20 students and a handful of passionate educators. Today, we stand as Kerala's most prestigious fashion institute, recognized by the Government of Kerala and AICTE, with state-of-the-art facilities and industry-experienced faculty. What sets us apart is our commitment to blending traditional craftsmanship with cutting-edge technology, ensuring our graduates are prepared for the evolving fashion landscape.`, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1558618666-fcd25c85cd64?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80' }, mission: { title: 'Our Mission', content: `To empower creative minds with world-class fashion education that combines artistic excellence with business acumen. We strive to create industry leaders who will shape the future of fashion while maintaining ethical and sustainable practices. Our mission extends beyond education – we aim to be a catalyst for innovation in the fashion industry, fostering creativity, entrepreneurship, and social responsibility among our students. We believe in nurturing not just skilled professionals, but conscious creators who understand the impact of fashion on society and the environment.`, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1581833971358-2c8b550f87b3?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80' }, values: { title: 'Our Values', content: `Excellence: We maintain the highest standards in education, facilities, and student outcomes. Innovation: We embrace new technologies and methodologies to stay ahead of industry trends. Integrity: We operate with transparency, honesty, and ethical practices in all our endeavors. Inclusivity: We welcome students from all backgrounds and provide equal opportunities for growth. Sustainability: We promote eco-conscious practices and sustainable fashion principles. Collaboration: We foster partnerships with industry leaders and international institutions.`, image: 'https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1556742049-0cfed4f6a45d?ixlib=rb-4.0.3&auto=format&fit=crop&w=800&q=80' } }; return (
{/* Section Header */}
About Oxford

Crafting Fashion Leaders for 25+ Years

From humble beginnings to becoming Kerala's most prestigious fashion institute, our journey is one of passion, innovation, and unwavering commitment to excellence.

{/* Main Content */}
{/* Tab Navigation */}
{Object.keys(tabContent).map((tab) => ( ))}
{/* Tab Content */}

{tabContent[activeTab].title}

{tabContent[activeTab].content.split('\n\n').map((paragraph, index) => (

{paragraph.trim()}

))}
Government Approved
AICTE Recognized
Industry Certified
25+ Years
5000+ Alumni
95% Success
{/* Timeline Section */}

Our Journey of Excellence

Milestones that shaped our legacy in fashion education

{timelineData.map((item, index) => (
{item.year}

{item.title}

{item.description}

))}
{/* Accreditations */}

Accreditations & Certifications

Government of Kerala

Officially recognized and approved by the State Government

AICTE Approved

All India Council for Technical Education certified programs

Industry Certified

Programs certified by leading fashion industry bodies

International Standards

Curriculum aligned with global fashion education standards

{/* Background Elements */}
); }; export default About;
